noisepp::utils::JobQueue

noisepp::utils::JobQueue Class Reference

#include <NoiseJobQueue.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::utils::JobQueue:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

You can add jobs to this queue which will be executed when you call the executeJobs() function.

virtual void addJob (Job *job)
